KPIDefinition.Description: The quality ratio is the relationship between the good quantity (GQ) and the produced quantity (PQ).
KPIDefinition.Name: Quality Ratio
KPIDefinition.Scope: Work unit, work centre, area, product, time period, product, defect types
KPIDefinition.Formula: Quality Ratio = Good Quantity / Produced Quantity
KPIDefinition.Notes: ”This indicator is usable as real-time indicator for the operator level.”
